purpose.title: 1. Purpose and Scope
purpose.content:
This Privacy Policy describes how BBAR Unipessoal LDA ("SmartHoster," "we," "our," or "us") collects, processes, stores, protects, and, where necessary, discloses personal data. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data in full compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR – Regulation EU 2016/679) and all applicable Portuguese and European data protection laws.

This policy applies to all users, clients, property owners, guests, subcontractors, vendors, and website visitors who interact with SmartHoster.io through any means, including web portals, communication channels, and integrated platforms.

dataCollection.title: 3. Personal Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect and process the following categories of personal data:
categories: Identity Data: Full name, date of birth, national identification number, passport number, NIF (Portuguese Tax ID)
Contact Data: Phone number, email address, physical address
Financial Data: IBAN, bank account information, billing address, payment method
Property Data: Ownership documentation, access credentials (e.g. smart locks), maintenance history
Usage Data: IP addresses, device identifiers, browser details, geolocation, session metadata
Service Interaction Data: Booking records, guest history, cleaning schedules, communication logs
Legal and Compliance Data: Data required for reporting to SEF, AIMA, AT, and other authorities
Media and Visual Data: Images and recordings from intercom, smart lock systems, or CCTV (where applicable)

lawfulBases.title: 4. Lawful Bases for Processing
lawfulBases.content: We process your personal data on the following legal grounds:
bases: Performance of a contract: When we enter into or carry out an agreement with you
Legal obligation: For compliance with tax, immigration, and housing regulations
Legitimate interest: To maintain service quality, security, fraud prevention, or internal administration
Consent: For optional communications or non-essential data collection (withdrawable at any time)
Public interest: When required to cooperate with public entities under law

dataUse.title: 5. How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: We use your personal data to:
purposes: Operate and deliver SmartHoster.io's property management and guest hosting services
Register guest data with national systems (e.g. SEF, AIMA, eFatura)
Coordinate and track cleanings, maintenance, and access operations
Communicate with you regarding bookings, services, payments, and legal matters
Issue legal documents such as invoices and reports
Fulfill local lodging compliance, including tourist tax collection
Maintain operational security, including video surveillance and access logs
Conduct statistical analysis and performance tracking
Respond to inquiries, disputes, and customer support requests

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We may share personal data with:
parties: Governmental authorities: SEF (Immigration Services), AIMA, Autoridade Tributária (Tax Office), Bank of Portugal
Technology partners: e.g. Nuki, Stripe, Hostaway, HostKit, Notion, Tawk, other service integrations
Subcontracted professionals: Cleaning teams, maintenance providers, licensed technicians
Auditors, accountants, legal advisors: Under NDA or equivalent confidentiality agreement
Insurers: For claims related to damage, liability, or coverage
dataSharing.noSale: We do not sell, rent, or trade your data to any third party.
dataSharing.transfers: Where data is transferred outside the EU/EEA, we ensure lawful safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) or equivalent protections.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain personal data only for the duration necessary to fulfill its purpose and comply with legal obligations:
periods: Billing, tax, and contract records: 10 years
Client and service data: For the duration of the relationship, and up to 3 years after termination
Marketing and communication records: Until consent is withdrawn
Access and surveillance footage: Maximum of 30 days, unless legally required to retain longer
retention.erasure: All data is securely erased or anonymized after expiration of the retention period.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR and Portuguese law, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
list: Right to access: Obtain a copy of your personal data
Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
Right to erasure: Request deletion of data, subject to legal limits
Right to restriction: Limit how we use your data
Right to object: Oppose certain uses of your data, including direct marketing
Right to data portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Right to withdraw consent: At any time, for processing based on consent
Right to lodge a complaint: With the Comissão Nacional de Proteção de Dados (CNPD)
rights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at admin@smarthoster.io

security.title: 9. Data Security
security.content: We take data protection seriously and use the following safeguards:
measures: Encryption: All sensitive data is encrypted during transmission and storage
Access Control: Role-based access, multi-factor authentication, audit logs
Data Minimization: We only collect what is strictly necessary
Secure Infrastructure: Firewalls, monitoring, backup protocols, and physical security
Employee Training: All staff and contractors are bound by confidentiality obligations
security.breach: In the event of a data breach, we will notify the CNPD and affected individuals where required by law.

minors.title: 10. Minors
minors.content: We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16, except in cases where guest identification is legally required for SEF registration, and consent is provided by a parent or legal guardian.

cookies.title: 11. Cookies & Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
SmartHoster.io uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, analyze traffic, and manage sessions.

We use:
types: Essential cookies: For login, navigation, and basic site functionality
Analytics cookies: e.g. Google Analytics, to improve performance
Functional cookies: To remember preferences and settings
cookies.disclosure: Cookie usage is disclosed in our separate Cookie Policy, and consent is obtained where required.

automated.title: 12. Automated Processing and Profiling
automated.content: We may use limited forms of automated processing to:
uses: Detect fraudulent behavior or abnormal access
Optimize rental pricing using dynamic calendar tools
Trigger maintenance reminders or overdue alerts
automated.impact: These processes do not result in automated decisions with legal or significant impact without human intervention.

changes.title: 13. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in law or services. The latest version will always be available on our website. Significant changes will be communicated via email or in-app notification.
